description: This file contains unit tests for the filterCardsAND function used to filter kanban cards based on multiple filters. It includes test cases that verify the filtering logic across different fields like assignee, priority, status, column, and due date, using the Jest framework.

methods.name: filterCardsAND(cards, filters, columns)
methods.description: Filters a list of cards based on multiple filter criteria, including assignee, priority, status, column, and due date range.
